jouvieje.bass

Class BassInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • jouvieje.bass.BassInit

  • public class BassInit
extends java.lang.Object
    Initialization of NativeBass.
    You should call BassInit.loadLibraries() before using NativeBass.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEBUG
      Display errors when loading libraries

    • Field Detail

      • DEBUG

        public static boolean DEBUG
        Display errors when loading libraries

    • Method Detail

      • loadLibraries

        public static void loadLibraries()
                          throws BassException
        Load native libraries
        Throws:
        BassException - exception that occures when all libraries are not properly loaded.

      • BASSVERSION

        public static final int BASSVERSION()
        BASS version.

      • NATIVEBASS_JAR_VERSION

        public static final int NATIVEBASS_JAR_VERSION()
        NativeBass jar version.
        0xaaaabbcc -> aaaa = major version number. bb = minor version number. cc = development version number.

        Warning :
        NativeBass & BASS have different versions !

      • NATIVEBASS_LIBRARY_VERSION

        public static final int NATIVEBASS_LIBRARY_VERSION()
        NativeBass library version.
        0xaaaabbcc -> aaaa = major version number. bb = minor version number. cc = development version number.

        Warning :
        NativeBass & BASS have different versions !

      • isLibrariesLoaded

        public static final boolean isLibrariesLoaded()
        Returns:
        true if all requiered libraries are loaded.
